title: I am level 10 and still didn't get free champion rotation.
body:
Hello.
Can someone explain me why do I not have the free champion rotation? I still have the 1-6 free champion rotation, also I am level 10. It didn't update at all.
On other accounts it unblocked at lvl 6.
Please help:P

replies.body: The special lower level rotation is for 10 and under, pretty sure the normal rotation actually starts at level 11. I'm really not sure why the rotation would have changed for your other accounts at level 6 o_O.
